definition: معنوى ma‘nawī relating to the sense or import (of a word or expression; as opposed to لفظي lafẓī); semantic, significative, of or pertaining to meaning; ideal, ideational, ideative; abstract; mental; spiritual (as opposed to material) │ شخص معنوى (šakṣ) artificial, conventional, or juristic, person, a body corporate as a subject of rights and duties
